segments.advisor_message: So, to start, could you tell me how you're doin' health-wise?
segments.client_message: Uh, well, I'm not sick or anythin', but I smoke. Like, I think I started around, uh, age 22? And now, I smoke about a pack a day, which is, um, between 20 and 25 cigarettes. My kinda just, ya know, like the usual stress stuff, I guess?

segments.advisor_message: Alright, I get it. Do you need any kinda long-term care set up?
segments.client_message: Well, not really right now, but I ain't got a will or any power of attorney stuff either. So, I guess, uh, I'm kinda just floating along? But if I could get a bit organized, that'd be good.
